channel.title: Hey guys help please!
channel.description: I have setup GTLVote on my website, i have done myRemoteSQL but why can't my server connect? I think it is a database issue? Someone please have a look at the error for me via TV. I thought it would be better to post in here as it is a mySQL connection error, if not staff please move it:)

item.title: Hey guys help please!
item.dc:creator: @FrozenAge FrozenAge
item.description:
@FrozenAge wrote:

Did you import the database? Is the remote host configured to allow your website’s IP to connect to MySQL?

Read full topic
